Source.Name: gitbatch
Source.Summary: Manage your git repositories in one place
Source.Description: Managing multiple git repositories is easier than ever. I (was) often end up working on many directories and manually pulling updates etc. To make this routine faster, I created a simple tool to handle this job. Although the focus is batch jobs, you can still do de facto micro management of your git repositories (e.g add/reset, stash, commit etc.).
